conversations.content: I have many items in my cart and want to clear out everything except for the electric toothbrush. Please remove the other items and place the order.

<|Function_Thought|>
The cart contains three items: a TechBrand Wireless Mouse, a Backpack, and an Electric Toothbrush. The task is to remove the Wireless Mouse and the Backpack, keeping only the Electric Toothbrush in the cart. After that, I will proceed to checkout the remaining item.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[cart_remove_product(product_id="P001")]<|/Function_Call|>
Product ID P001 removed from cart.

<|Function_Thought|>
The TechBrand Wireless Mouse has been successfully removed from the cart. Next, I will remove the Backpack from the cart.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[cart_remove_product(product_id="P017")]<|/Function_Call|>
Product ID P017 removed from cart.

<|Function_Thought|>
Both the TechBrand Wireless Mouse and the Backpack have been successfully removed from the cart. Now, only the Electric Toothbrush remains. I will proceed to checkout the remaining item in the cart.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[checkout_selected_cart(product_ids=["P011"])]<|/Function_Call|>
Please verify your account to proceed the checkout. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.

It seems you need to verify your account before proceeding with the checkout. Please check your email for the verification one-time password (OTP) and provide it so I can continue with the checkout process.
